name: Dual Gravity (KattyBatt)
description:
A 72 hour gamejam project for moonmoon gamejam 2021.

The universe is folding onto itself. You and your alternate self must find your way to the portal while navigating the hazards of the world

much moon2SUFFER will you accumulate? Will you get the moon2POG

Also at: https://play.unity.com/mg/other/dual-gravity (I was not the one who uploaded it, this is the original 1.0 gamejam release, warts and all)

Credits:

Discord usernames 

Enomya#0042; MrMiew#4972; RayChu#8047; ShyGuise#7515; loquacity#5012

Music: "5 Chiptunes (Action)" By SubspaceAudio, Licensed CC0: https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action

Releases:

Dual Gravity V1.01: 

  • Tidied up some backend things. 
  • Added more sound effects (button hover over, landing, color switch, footsteps)
  • Fixed a bug that allows you to land on and jump off of some goo buildings if you buffered your input, without dying. 

Dual Gravity [WebGL] V1.0 Original Submission: 

  • Original submission at the end of the game jam.
